author: Mix
title: Russia developing coronavirus tracking app to ensure patients stay home
description: It seems Russia is taking a leaf out of China’s book. The country is scheming to roll out an app to track citizens diagnosed with coronavirus in an effort to monitor whether they’re abiding orders to stay home. According to government officials, the software …
content:
It seems Russia is taking a leaf out of Chinas book. The country is scheming to roll out an app to track citizens diagnosed with coronavirus in an effort to monitor whether theyre abiding orders to stay home.
